Description.Text: Harry''s Home Wien is a stylish 4-star designer property offering contemporary accommodation near the centre of Vienna. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and a good location close to several U-Bahn stations and bus stops. Brigittenau is a densely populated residential area on the east bank of the Danube river. Nearby places of interest include Augarten and the former Meldemannstrasse dormitory. Handelskai U-Bahn is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Vienna destinations. The hotel is housed in the Millennium Tower, a modern high-rise circular building. Facilities include a lounge which boasts a mini-library, flat-screen TV, internet corner and a bar. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Studio Executive rooms are approximately 28sqm and are decorated in a minimalistic modern style with dark wood floors. They feature views of the Danube river. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, work desk and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. The property has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
